name: Reggies Adventure
description:
Reggie's adventure is a retro 2d platformer where a blob like creature named Reggie must make it to his home.  This game was made for fun in 52 hours in the span of 3 weeks for my friends to play! 

Story:

Reggie gets sucked into a black hole and transported to the spike dimension where he must escape and return back home to the cloud dimeson.  He must wall jump duck and doge his way back home safely to be reunited with his friends!

Controls:

W or Spacebar to jump and A to move left D to move right.

Game is by Karlo Kablar
